TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 包含屬性和方法，可為工作流程設計介面上的所有根目錄設計工具提供一致的外觀及操作。

span.span: Contains properties and methods to provide consistent look and feel to all root designers on a workflow design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 一般來說，當在工作流程設計工具中建立工作流程時，便會建立一個循序工作流程根目錄設計工具類別的執行個體，而這個執行個體即表示使用者可以在上面新增和編輯活動的設計工具介面。Typically, an instance of a sequential workflow root designer class is created when a workflow is created in a workflow designer and it represents the designer surface on which users can add and edit activities. 工作流程根目錄設計工具沒有父設計工具，除非其為 活動的子系。A workflow root designer does not have a parent designer unless it is the child of an activity. 所有的工作流程根目錄設計工具都必須衍生自 。All workflow root designers must derive from .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool CanBeParentedTo(class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner parentActivityDesigner) cil managed
Public Overrides Function CanBeParentedTo (parentActivityDesigner As CompositeActivityDesigner) As Boolean

span.span: The to check.

summary.span: 傳回值，這個值表示 是否可以設定為與設計工具關聯之活動的父系。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether a can be set as the parent of the activity associated with the designer.

returns.span: 如果允許與 關聯的活動可以成為與 關聯之活動的父系則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to allow the activity associated with to be the parent of the activity associated with the ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根目錄設計工具在工作流程設計介面上不可以有父活動設計工具。Root designers cannot have a parent activity designer on a workflow design surface. 除非在繼承類別中覆寫，否則 會傳回 `false`。Unless overridden in an inheriting class, returns `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property CanExpandCollapse As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanExpandCollapse { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示設計工具是否可以展開和摺疊。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer can be expanded and collapsed.

value.span: 如果 可以展開和摺疊則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the can be expanded and collapsed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非在衍生類別中覆寫，否則 會永遠設為 `false`。Unless overridden in a deriving class, is always set to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property Footer As SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter

summary.span: 取得與根目錄設計工具關聯的頁尾。

span.span: Gets the footer associated with the root designer.
The that represents the footer associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的內容會顯示在工作流程設計介面中之根目錄設計工具的底部。The contents of appear at the bottom of the root designer on the workflow design surface. 圖示和文字會顯示在頁尾，包括按鈕圖示，當使用者選取其中一個時即可改變設計工具檢視。Icons and text can be displayed in the footer, including button icons that change the designer view when a user selects one of them.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的內容會顯示在工作流程設計介面中之根目錄設計工具的頂端。The contents of appear at the top of the root designer on the workflow design surface. 圖示和文字會顯示在頁首，包括指出目前顯示在設計介面上之設計工具檢視的文字。Icons and text can be displayed in the header, including text that indicates the designer view that is currently displayed on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性設定為要顯示的 。 property is set to the to display. 您可在設計階段或執行階段時設定。You can do this at design time or at run time. 除非在衍生類別中覆寫，否則 會傳回 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)。Unless overridden in a derived class, returns a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會使用適當的主題設定繪製任何要包含在頁首和頁尾的文字。 draws any text to include in the headers and footers with the appropriate theme settings. 它也會繪製任何要包含在頁首和頁尾的影像。It also draws any images to include in the headers and footers. **請注意**當您覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫方法的基底類別，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。**Note** When you override in a derived class, be sure to call the method of the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當呼叫時， 會使與 關聯的文字矩形失效。When called, invalidates the text rectangle associated with the . **請注意**當您覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。**Note** When you override in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 屬性不是設為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`) 而且對應的 屬性不是空字串或設為 null 參考 (`Nothing`)， 會傳回 `true`。If the property is not set to a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) and the corresponding property is not an empty string or set to a null reference (`Nothing`), returns `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根目錄設計工具的標題區域通常包含標頭以及與設計工具相關聯的任何圖示。A root designer title area typically contains the header and any icon associated with the designer. 會計算其傳回的整數，方法是取得其基底實作的值並加入為 定義的高度整數。 calculates the integer it returns by getting the value of its base implementation and adding the height integer defined for the .
